video.title: Spartacus
video.synopsis: A Thracian man is condemned to a brutal death in the arena, only to outlast his executioners and be reborn as the enslaved gladiator Spartacus.

episodes.synopsis: After a Thracian warrior enlisted by the Romans to fight commits an act of rebellious violence, he is forced to do battle in the gladiatorial arena.
episodes.title: The Red Serpent

episodes.synopsis: Enslaved in gladiatorial school, the newly christened Spartacus buries his desire for revenge when his new master vows to reunite him with his wife.
episodes.title: Sacramentum Gladiatorum

episodes.synopsis: Although he has proved himself in training, Spartacus's coarse attitude and relentless quest to see his wife isolate him from his fellow gladiators.
episodes.title: Legends

episodes.synopsis: Having performed shamefully in the arena against Crixus, Spartacus is forced to fight in the pits. Batiatus may be at risk if his debts aren't repaid.
episodes.title: The Thing in the Pit

episodes.synopsis: Batiatus challenges Spartacus and Crixus to overcome their mutual hostility and fight as a team against a legendary and unbeaten opponent.
episodes.title: Shadow Games

episodes.synopsis: Flush with Spartacus's victory in the arena, Batiatus informs the gladiator that he will now fulfill his deepest wish to be reunited with his wife.
episodes.title: Delicate Things

episodes.synopsis: Overcome by his wife's death and the pressure of Batiatus's control, Spartacus must make a choice: assume the mantle of a champion gladiator, or die.
episodes.title: Great and Unfortunate Things

episodes.synopsis: Batiatus buys more slaves to be trained as gladiators and ponders the idea of selling Crixus. Ilithyia coaxes a new recruit to try to kill Spartacus.
episodes.title: Mark of the Brotherhood

episodes.synopsis: Batiatus breaks the news that Spartacus is to service the richest woman in Rome.
episodes.title: Whore

episodes.synopsis: Spartacus and Crixus are set up to fight in an exhibition match for Numerius's birthday -- but Crixus is intent on blood.
episodes.title: Party Favors

episodes.synopsis: Spartacus hovers on the brink. Meanwhile, Batiatus plots revenge against his enemies.
episodes.title: Old Wounds

episodes.synopsis: Lucretia and Batiatus await the arrival of Glaber, hoping to receive his patronage, while Spartacus focuses his attention on his plan for revenge.
episodes.title: Revelations

episodes.synopsis: Spartacus's fury culminates in the stunning season finale.
episodes.title: Kill Them All

episodes.synopsis: When young Batiatus is put in charge of his father's gladiator school, he uses his best fighter to win favor with the nobleman behind the new arena.
episodes.title: Past Transgressions

episodes.synopsis: Batiatus enlists Lucretia, Gaia and a clutch of gladiators to follow through on his devious plan. Oenomaus longs to reclaim his rank as top gladiator.
episodes.title: Missio

episodes.synopsis: Just as his fortunes and future seem clear, the manipulative Batiatus is stunned by the return of his father, who jeopardizes his son's rise in class.
episodes.title: Paterfamilias

episodes.synopsis: The House of Batiatus is caught in the power struggle between the younger and elder Batiatus. Lucretia reluctantly agrees to her husband's risky plan.
episodes.title: Beneath the Mask

episodes.synopsis: Batiatus's father announces a tournament to determine the worth of his gladiators, drawing Crixus, who wants to prove himself, into house power plays.
episodes.title: Reckoning

episodes.synopsis: Batiatus seeks vengeance for all that has befallen him. The opening of the new arena arrives, promising a spectacle of combat and blood.
episodes.title: The Bitter End

episodes.synopsis: Spartacus discovers the grave responsibilities and costs involved in his new role as a leader of freed slaves.
episodes.title: Fugitivus

episodes.synopsis: Spartacus and his men liberate a Roman villa, but its slaves are wary. Oenomaus throws himself into the brutal pits.
episodes.title: A Place in This World

episodes.synopsis: Spartacus must navigate a divide that opens up among the gladiators after news of Naevia's fate.
episodes.title: The Greater Good

episodes.synopsis: Spartacus leads survivors through the woods, but Crixus gets separated and returns to a place of past suffering.
episodes.title: Empty Hands

episodes.synopsis: Spartacus leads a bold mission to free Crixus from Roman captivity, but a storied gladiator from the House of Batiatus complicates matters.
episodes.title: Libertus

episodes.synopsis: Spartacus urges his restless rebels to train for the defense of their new sanctuary. Lucretia and Ilithyia seek comfort from each other.
episodes.title: Chosen Path

episodes.synopsis: Spartacus and his rebels try to increase their numbers by freeing fighters enslaved in foreign wars.
episodes.title: Sacramentum

episodes.synopsis: Spartacus gets a chance for vengeance when a prominent Roman is captured, but will he satisfy his desire at the cost of the greater good?
episodes.title: Balance

episodes.synopsis: Spartacus must convince his people to unite against the imminent Roman assault.
episodes.title: Monsters

episodes.synopsis: Dwindling supplies and a superior Roman enemy bring the rebellion to its knees, and Spartacus must restore hope to his people.
episodes.title: Wrath of the Gods

episodes.synopsis: Spartacus continues to expand his army and outwit Rome's best commanders. Meanwhile, the empire is forced to turn to wealthy Marcus Crassus for aid.
episodes.title: Enemies of Rome

episodes.synopsis: Spartacus leads a daring assault to provide food and shelter for his people. Crassus builds a fearsome army and receives an unexpected visitor.
episodes.title: Wolves at the Gate

episodes.synopsis: Spartacus considers making a deal with a band of marauders to ensure his people stay supplied and fed. Crassus' son Tiberius makes a fateful decision.
episodes.title: Men of Honor

episodes.synopsis: The possible infiltration of a Roman spy causes tension to mount between Spartacus and his men. Crassus revives an abandoned form of Roman punishment.
episodes.title: Decimation

episodes.synopsis: Spartacus puts a plan in motion to weaken Crassus's forces and gain the upper hand. Betrayal threatens to foil the plan.
episodes.title: Blood Brothers

episodes.synopsis: As Crassus leads an onslaught against the rebel-occupied city, Gannicus finds himself trapped behind enemy lines.
episodes.title: Spoils of War

episodes.synopsis: Their forces trapped on an impassable snowbound ridge, Spartacus and Crixus clash over the method of escape.
episodes.title: Mors Indecepta

episodes.synopsis: Spartacus and the rebels arrive at a crossroads. With Crassus relentlessly pursuing Spartacus, the conflict between Tiberius and Caesar escalates.
episodes.title: Separate Paths

episodes.synopsis: Crassus learns a fellow Roman wants to steal the glory of defeating Spartacus. Spartacus aims to secure a bargaining chip to use against the Romans.
episodes.title: The Dead and the Dying

episodes.synopsis: Spartacus and his outnumbered rebels make one last attempt to win freedom in an epic final battle against the Romans.
episodes.title: Victory
